email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for 150,000 MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 10th to 15th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
James Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 24.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Laura Smith
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 24.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 20,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 10th to 15th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
James Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 24.75 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Laura Smith
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Tubarao on 10th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
James Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Laura Smith
Global Charterers
